knimeNode.name: LeafOrdering
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reorders a tree to an optimal ordering. See New Hierarchical Clustering node.

fullDescription.intro: The implemented algorithm based on this article: K-ary clustering with optimal leaf ordering for gene expression data

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)

ports.inPort: A tree of clusters with distances between them.
